content: cherries the little toy crochet pattern i want to thank you so much for purchasing my pattern nice to meet you my name is victoria i`m the designer of this pattern i`ll be glad to see your about 6-7 cm/ 2 5 inches size of the toys depended from yarn thickness hook thickness or solidity of crocheting materials  yarn yarnart jeans 50g/160m 55% cotton/45% pac fine 2 red #26 and green #69  crotchet hook 1 75 mm  fiberfill abbreviations and stitches used magic_ring magic_ring chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together increase
